level.heading: Construction of §§ 34-706 and 34-731.
level.text: The provisions of §§ 34-706 and 34-731 relating to the orders, rules, and regulations of the Public Service Commission may be enforced either as provided in § 34-706 or § 34-731.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 5-153
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 5-153, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 34-706.
